SELECT P.SUPPLIES_ID AS suppliesId,P.SUPPLIES_NAME AS suppliesName,P.SORT_ID AS sortId,P.SUPPLIES_CODE AS suppliesCode, (SELECT S.SORT_NAME FROM OFFICE_SUPPLIES_SORT S WHERE S.ORG_ID=P.ORG_ID AND S.SORT_ID=P.SORT_ID) AS sortName, P.BRAND AS brand,P.MODEL AS model,P.UNIT AS unit,P.QUANTITY AS quantity FROM OFFICE_SUPPLIES P WHERE P.ORG_ID = #{orgId} AND P.STATUS='0'
AND (P.SUPPLIES_NAME LIKE #{search} OR P.SUPPLIES_CODE LIKE #{search})
AND P.SORT_ID = #{sortId}
AND P.QUANTITY>0
AND (FUN_INTE_ARRAY(P.OWN_DEPT,#{deptId}) > 0 OR P.OWN_DEPT='@all')
